name: Separator
description: Visual divider for separating content sections horizontally or vertically

accessibility.screenReader: Uses role=separator with aria-orientation for semantic separators. Decorative separators use role=none to be ignored by assistive technology. Non-decorative separators create logical content boundaries.

recommendedUsage: Use to visually divide sections of content. Use decorative prop when separation is purely visual. Choose orientation based on content layout (horizontal for stacked, vertical for inline).
antiPatterns: Do not use multiple consecutive separators. Avoid using separators where whitespace alone provides sufficient visual separation. Do not use for interactive dividers - use resizable panels instead.
